name: william
text: is honk a slang term for a shot or a brand new unit of alcohol?  i would totally buy a honk glass regardless.

name: unsentletter
text: I think a honk in this case is a shot or a slug of booze.  Not a new unit, just slang for during Serious Booze Time.

name: bozendoka
text: I imagine it to be closer to a snort.

name: aelindil
text: He, Roast Beef, does not like life.

name: echidnaboy
text:
"Hot Dogs"
by R. Beef Kazenzakis

A hot dog is whipped meat
the skin yields a snap.
The flavor unmistakable
the condiments eternal.

Ketchup, mustard,
ground onions and kraut,
pepperoncini, tomato,
all flavor the snout.

But inside the foodstuff
a hidden ink pen
single-shot .45 Magnum
hidden in the pen.

OH SHIIIIIIIT

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Ray's got a way with words, that's for sure.

name: saint
text: my car has been shot

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
can anyone explain "why you so down at the corners of your slice" to me?

i just got hit by a very fast slow-pitch softball.

name: babachewy
text: The slice is his mouth, so being down at the corners of your slice means you are frowning.

name: natashamarie
text: some classic "ohhhhhhh shiiiiiiiiiiiit"

name: heavymetaljesus
text: "Dogg do not castigate me" is equal or almost equal to "Dogg don't piss on me I just invented photoshop" in it's hilarity.

name: redmad
text: So... so is he like shouting 'ohhhhh shiiiiit' or just kind of whispering it?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i usually hear it as yelling.

but just now i imagined it going from whispering to a medium-loud voice and that works really nicely, too.

name: lucid
text:
I hear it as a stressed whisper. The way he comes close to the mic, and the manner in which it is used - When you suddenly realise the terrible truth.

ohhhhhhh
shiiiiiiiiiiiit

name: rotavele
text: I always figured beefs poetry is because his grandma always told him everything was gonna make him die, like how he was scared to go in a lake in case there was an earthquake.  So he writes about how a pepper mill has been fashioned into an explosive device.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i vote for this one.  hes paranoid.  like a mofo.

name: spinynorman
text:
I had to sit through something like this once at a performance art gallery. Some asshat in a yellow bedsheet read about colors while a dude played a guitar with a cello bow. They had free beer though, and I wound up double fisting lager through the whole thing and started quietly beatboxing along to the song myself and didn't notice until I realized how mad everyone else in the bleachers looked.

Good times.

name: molesticide
text:
dude i love to beatbox

nobody around me EVER loves that i beatbox

HOW COME

name: phthoggos
text: True.

name: gumfish
text: I love beatboxing, but I'm so crap at it. I can't make anything of it sound right, yet I still manage to use every opportunity I get to embarrass myself with it. Good fun.

name: biznart
text: Probably because they do not like to be spit upon and such.

name: laserblade
text: You are what I want to be when I grow up. Even though you're only half a decade older than me. Spiny Norman, you have lived .

name: clintisiceman
text: I just love how Ray took to time to copyright the poem he had just written that afternoon before going to perform it at open mic night.

name: twohundredninety
text: In the United States, at least, copyright is automatic. You don't even have to do anything. You can go to trouble to document priority or something if you really want, but all you have to do in order to own the copyright on something is make it.

name: clintisiceman
text: That is insane. I will insult the system to draw attention from my ignorance.

name: decagon
text: "water-clad nymphs" -> automatic 5

name: falseprophet
text:
Can't live with 'em, can't live without 'em.

Also, when you cheat on them, they drown you with their prom dress.

name: tellumo
text: and then Ophelia and the Lady of Shalott giggle as they talk smack about you at lunch.

name: direhaggis
text:
Land where my fathers died,
Land of the Pilgrim's pride,
From every mountain side,
Let freedom ring.

My car has been shot.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
oh that i had a chubby for you.

you being given my first virtual chubby in a long, long while.

name: layzerblade
text:
So let freedom ring from the prodigious hilltops of New Hampshire. Let freedom ring from the mighty mountains of New York. Let freedom ring from the heightening Alleghenies of Pennsylvania!

Let freedom ring from the snowcapped Rockies of Colorado!

Let freedom ring from the curvaceous slopes of California!

But not only that; let freedom ring from Stone Mountain of Georgia!

Let freedom ring from Lookout Mountain of Tennessee!

Let freedom ring from every hill and molehill of Mississippi. From every mountainside, let freedom ring.

And when this happens, when we allow freedom to ring, when we let it ring from every village and every hamlet, from every state and every city, we will be able to speed up that day when all of God's children, black men and white men, Jews and Gentiles, Protestants and Catholics, will be able to join hands and sing in the words of the old Negro spiritual, "Free at last! free at last! thank God Almighty, we are free at last!"

But not today.

My car has been shot.
